## ğŸŒŸ Features

PEFT Studio makes fine-tuning LLMs accessible with:

- **Visual Configuration** - No code required for basic fine-tuning
- **Multiple PEFT Methods** - LoRA, QLoRA, Prefix Tuning, and more
- **Cloud Integration** - Connect to AWS, Azure, GCP, and more
- **Experiment Tracking** - Built-in integration with Weights & Biases
- **Cost Estimation** - Know your costs before you start
- **Model Browser** - Discover and compare models from Hugging Face
- **Deployment Tools** - Deploy your fine-tuned models easily
